Everyone in the world knows of the greatest danish heroes to have ever lived. The rightful winners of Tour de France 2004. None other than the cycling team "Team easy on!"

Accomplistments

Best wildcard team

In their prime, they sat atop all other cycling wildcard teams as the undisputed number 1!

Winners of Tour De France

In 2004 they won Tour De France, but their victory was stolen by dirty officials who accepted bribes from Lance Armstrong and his team, thereby making him appear as the winner of the race.

About

The team consisted of Members:
Henning Primdahl - as coach and manager
Bobby Olsen - team captain
Pim Dekeysergracht - dutch sprinter

Sponsorships

The team was sponsored by, and named after, the very prestigious condom brand "Easy On"

Pink & Orange

Is the color combination, and the teams colors.
